name: Enduring Beauty, Herminia
effect: DressUp - "Coming Beauty, Herminia" (During this fight, this card is regarded as having the same card name as the specified card)[CONT](VC):During your battle phase, if your damage zone has three or more face down cards, the cost of all the [AUTO] abilities of all of your front row units with the Powerful ability is reduced by [Counter-Blast 1].Powerful - [AUTO](VC):If you persona rode this turn, this cost may be paid with "[Counter-Blast 1]". At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if your soul has no cards, [COST][discard a card with "Herminia" in its card name from hand], and [Stand] all of your front row rear-guards with the Powerful ability.
flavor: The concept is "to be resurrected without decay".

name: Gorgon Eyes, Siana
effect: [CONT](VC):If your opponent's (GC) and front row (RC) have a total of two or less units, this unit gets [Critical] +1/drive +1.[AUTO](VC):When this unit is attacked, [COST][put a trigger unit from hand into soul], and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit was attacked by a rear-guard, if no cards were put on (GC) this battle, your opponent chooses a card from their hand, and they may discard it. If they did not discard a card, bind the rear-guard that attacked.
flavor: Hehehe♪ My bare face? Come to my live performance and I'll show it to you~♪

name: Colored Bop Dragon, Walbrigia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), choose up to one grade 4 card from your hand, and reveal it. If you revealed a card, or your vanguard is grade 4, perform one of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) ‐ [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. ・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle. [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand while riding a grade 3 card from the ride deck or paying the cost for [Stride], draw a card.
flavor: It matters not your race, gender or age. If you're aiming to become an idol, the school gates will open for you.

name: Top Idol, Pacifica
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a card from hand on the bottom of the deck], and draw two cards. [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1 card with "Pacifica" in its card name], search your deck for up to one normal unit, call it to an open (RC), and shuffle the deck.
flavor: Sung of in legends, the greatest idol in all eternity.

name: Tr!ple×Tr!ck, Fenelle
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, you can play three orders, but you cannot play orders other than "Trick & Treat!" or [Regalis Piece]. [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if you played three or more orders this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, until end of turn, that unit and this unit get [Critical] +1, and all of your front row units get [Power] +2000 for each "Trick & Treat!" in your drop.
flavor: Mischief and sweets, all set and ready! Let's go, shoo-pa!

name: Planet Idol, Pacifica
effect: [CONT]Back Row Center (RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Pacifica" in its card name, this unit can attack from the back row, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +10000. [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Pacifica" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you put a card from the back row center column into soul, draw a card.
flavor: This planet once, was conquered by a single girl.

name: PR♥ISM-Promise, Labrador
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, return it to hand, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to two unit cards with "PR♥ISM" in their card names from your hand, and call them to open (RC). If you called a card, draw a card, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, until end of turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000, and this unit gets [Critical] +1.
flavor: The promise of everlasting smiles we shared that day.

name: Full Moon Magic, Fortia
effect: DressUp - "MiMish, Fortia" (During this fight, this card is regarded as having the same card name as the specified card)Friend - [CONT](VC/RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends", and if you have three or more other "Friends", this unit gets drive +1.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:If you persona rode this turn, this cost may be paid with "[Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand]". At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have five or more other "Friends", [COST][discard a card with "Fortia" in its card name from hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -2 until end of turn.
flavor: Today's perfect for celebrating All Noctium Day♪

name: LèVre♡SœurS, Charmout
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to two grade 2 or less cards with "LèVre♡SœurS" in their card names from your soul, call them to (RC), and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks while not boosted, choose three of your grade 2 or less rear-guards with "LèVre♡SœurS" in their different card names, and increase or decrease their [Power] to match this unit's [Power] until end of turn. If this unit's [Power] is 33000 or greater, and your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], until end of turn, the rear-guard in the back row center column chosen by this ability can attack from the back row, and performs drive checks.
flavor: Four lips entwined in love herald the dawn of a time of enchantment.

name: Jack o' Parade, Theretheas
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and you may return it to hand.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Siana" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's open front row (RC). If it gets [Power] +10000 or greater, draw a card.
flavor: I'm gonna turn your head into a pumpkin~!

name: Soaring Bubble, Penelopp
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Kairi" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other front row rear-guard is returned to hand by the ability of your grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Kairi" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] all of your rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and if your vanguard is grade 4 or greater, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Emotions bubble up, soaring higher toward tomorrow.

name: One Night Witch, Strega
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) other than by a unit card's ability, if you played a normal order this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from among them and reveal it, call it to (RC) if it is a unit card, and put it into hand if it is a normal order. Shuffle the deck.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater unit, if this unit was placed this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Only for now. Because I wish to enjoy this moment with you.

name: Vivid Night Festival, Orialis
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one grade 2 or less card with "LèVre♡SœurS" in its card name, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck.[ACT](RC):If you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "LèVre♡SœurS" in its card name, [COST][[Rest] this unit], choose a card from your drop, put it into soul, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Let's go! To the stage where brilliant love unfolds!

name: Cooling Heart, Yuika
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit is placed in the same column as this unit, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted a rear-guard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of those boosted rear-guards, and return it to hand.
flavor: I'll handle the cleanup. Please rest early.

name: Rainbow Jeweled Beast, Olpirais
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), [COST][put a total of two cards from soul or drop that were in the ride deck into ride deck face up], and perform one of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) ‐ Choose a card with the same card name as your vanguard from your soul or drop, and put it into hand.・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Only those who continue to believe in their dreams can grasp the evening star.

name: Prank Explorer, Crispina
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck or drop for up to one "Trick & Treat!", reveal it and put it into hand, and if you searched the deck, shuffle the deck.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your drop has three or more "Trick & Treat!", this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: I'm off to search for surprises and excitement!

name: Demonic Fever, Garviera
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - During this fight, you get "During your turn, all your rear-guards get [Power] +10000"!
flavor: Countless "fanatics" that drowned in her charm are found all over the world.

name: Starry Witchcraft, Rosanne
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater vanguard, [COST][put a card from hand into soul], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose a card from among them, put it into hand, and put the rest on the bottom of the deck.
flavor: I found the sparkling spell of love☆

name: Decorate Shiny, Els
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Lilfa" in its card name, choose up to one grade 2 or greater unit card with a different card name from this unit from your hand, call it to a back row (RC), and it gets "Boost" until end of turn. If you called a card, perform one of the following.・If it is your main phase, draw a card. ・If it is your battle phase, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Leave it to me~ I'll make you look absolutely fabulous~!

name: Diva of Waterheart, Petronille
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "PR♥ISM" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you did not reveal a card, you may [Soul-Charge 2].[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Labrador" in its card name, you may return this unit to hand.
flavor: Water-lights glimmer and sway, and I swim beyond them.

name: Revere One, Milagros
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Michu" in its card name, [COST][put a card from hand into soul], choose a Cannonball card from your drop, put it into hand, and if your damage zone has three or more face down cards, and you did not [Counter-Charge] this turn, [Counter-Charge 1].[CONT](RC):If your Cannonball card was put from order zone into drop this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: Show me more of it. The miracle you ladies have brought forth.

name: Crystal of Special Emotions, Belianne
effect: Friend - [CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[CONT]Front Row (RC):During your turn, if you have three or more other "Friends", all of your vanguards with "Fortia" in their card names get [Power] +5000, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: Rejoice. For this was made with my own hands.

name: Heartsome Smile, Noelia
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Mediell" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your vanguards, and until end of turn, when a card from drop would be chosen by that unit's original [ACT] ability, choose two cards instead of one.
flavor: In her path, smiles bloom one by one.

name: PR♥ISM-Promise, Celtic
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand or put on (GC) from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Labrador" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Labrador" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], return this unit to hand, choose up to one of your rear-guards with "PR♥ISM" in its card name, and return it to hand.
flavor: The unshakable promise we once exchanged.

name: Rose of Exaltation, Custodia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with the Powerful ability, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with the Powerful ability and different card name from this unit from among them and reveal it, call it to (RC) if it is a grade 2 or less unit card, and put it into hand if not. If you put a card into hand, choose a card from your hand, and discard it. Shuffle the deck.Powerful - [CONT](GC):If you have a vanguard with "Herminia" in its card name, and your soul has no cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: I offer to you everything, encompassed in this single rose.

name: Haunted Spot, Iristana
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) during your main phase, if you played three or more orders this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a normal unit with a different card name from this unit from your drop, and call it to (RC). [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, search your deck for up to one "Trick & Treat!", reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck.
flavor: A night full of surprises and thrills won't end!

name: A Magician's Work, Colby
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "LèVre♡SœurS" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If your vanguard's [Power] is 23000 or greater, draw a card.
flavor: My mission is to make those flowers dancing in the night sky shimmer and sparkle!

name: Lottery Lollipop, Meriem
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Luticia" in its card name, [COST][discard a card from hand], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to two Cursed Play cards from among them, reveal them and put them into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you did not reveal any cards, draw a card. [CONT](RC):If you played a Cursed Play order this turn, this unit gets "Boost".
flavor: It comes with a guaranteed win. Wanna give it a try?

name: Raffish Runner, Junno
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Siana" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and you may return it to hand. If you [Soul-Blast] a trigger unit for this cost, choose one of your vanguards, and that unit and this unit get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Your headgear is awesome!

name: Revival Ocean, Solange
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Pacifica" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you did not reveal a card, [Counter-Charge 1].[AUTO](RC):When your other unit attacks from the back row center column, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The fairytale Diva still shines within my heart.

name: First Time into the Fray! Rabbilia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on the deck from (RC) during your battle phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your back row units, move it to an open front row (RC), and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: The nighttime parade will be lit with penlights~!

name: In Search of Limited Sweets, Mildred
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you played a Magazine order this turn, and you have three or more units with different grades, [COST][put this unit into soul], and draw a card.
flavor: As sources suggested, it was a splendid establishment.

name: Scrupulous Costume, Ethnida
effect: [CONT](RC):If you played a normal order this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck or drop for up to one "Pretty♡Demoncoord!", reveal it and put it into hand, and if you searched the deck, shuffle the deck.
flavor: The prerequisite of a demon's Demoncoord is excessive embellishments.

name: Rousing Vocal, Louison
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][retire this unit], choose up to two cards with "Pacifica" in their card names from your drop, return them to the deck and shuffle it. If you chose two cards, [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: I can't believe there's someone that amazing! I won't be outdone either!

name: PR♥ISM-Promise, Leyte
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand or put on (GC) from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Labrador" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000 until end of turn. [AUTO]:When this unit is returned to hand from (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Labrador" in its card name, you may [Soul-Charge 1]. Then, if you did not [Counter-Charge] this turn, [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: An unyielding soul's promise, exchanged once upon a time.

name: Super Aesthetic Shot!
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!You get "All of your rear-guards get [Power] +5000." until end of turn.
flavor: How to go viral is the secret theme among the students.

name: Grazing Tails of Many Meetings, Novella
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Petralka" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose up to two "Relation Weaver, Petralka" from your soul or drop, put one of them on the bottom of the deck, and put the rest into hand.
flavor: With you, every day is irreplaceable.

name: Dream Splurging, Ramona
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "LèVre♡SœurS" in its card name, [COST][put this unit and another rear-guard into soul], draw a card, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I bought all of these up to the purchase limit...♡Time to savor them slowly in my room~!

name: Impulsive Skater, Mewgyn
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from deck, if you have a vanguard with "Wilista" in its card name, choose a Gem card from your drop, and put it into hand.
flavor: Move aside~! I'm coming through!!

name: Nothing Short of Perfection, Lucca
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) or (GC), if you have a vanguard with "Astesice" in its card name, you may put this card into soul.
flavor: Unfailingly shrewd at all times. That is her style.

name: Creative Urge, Ceblu
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Kyouka" in its card name, you may have this unit get grade +1 until end of turn. [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you played a Magazine order this turn, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Maybe I should make that too~! With room for my ears♪

name: Bustling Streets, Olga
effect: [CONT](GC):If you have three or more grade 2 or greater rear-guards, this unit gets [Shield] +10000.
flavor: It'd be delightful if these lively days continued on.

name: Rattlin' Good Time, Flami
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is returned to hand from (RC) during your main phase, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Al~righty, snacks have been restocked! Let's keep it going~!

name: Irresistible Vibes, Ambel
effect: Friend - [CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a unit attacking a grade 3 or greater unit, if you have a vanguard with "Fortia" in its card name, and you have five or more other "Friends", [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and your opponent cannot call sentinels from hand to (GC) until end of that battle.
flavor: No one can resist an invitation from her.

name: Waiting Staging, Murmus
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if your soul has five or more Cursed Play cards, [COST][retire this unit], choose up to two Cursed Play cards from your soul, and put them into hand.
flavor: I'm really looking forward to your live show, Lulu♡

name: Whimsical↔Skip, Lopraht
effect: [CONT](GC):This unit gets [Shield] +5000 for every three "Trick & Treat!" in your drop.
flavor: That looks like fun! Let me join in♪

name: Groupie Member, Carlotta
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Feltyrosa" in its card name, this unit gets "Intercept", can intercept from the back row, and gets [Power] +2000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Those of ill repute are unworthy of aspiring for the moon.

name: Grab the First Row, Bernarda
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack of the unit this unit boosted hits, look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Pacifica" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you revealed a card, put this unit on the bottom of the deck.
flavor: I heard that the ballot results for the All Noctium Day special performance will release soon.

name: Dreaming of an Encounter, Hester
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire this unit], reveal the top three cards of your deck, choose up to two cards with "Earnescorrect" in their card names from among them, put them into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you chose two cards with the same card name, [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: I wonder if I'll be able to meet everyone from Earnes! It'd be so nice~

name: Nightlight Unison, Litael
effect: White Wings (Active when bind only has odd grades) - [AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if two or more of your vanguards with "Alestiel" in their card names were placed this turn, and your damage zone has no face up cards, [COST][put this unit into soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Unison with ghosts? Just watch me!

name: Pumpkin Breeze, Lybitta
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if you have five or more units with the Powerful ability, you may return all of your rear-guards in the same column as this unit to hand. Powerful - [CONT](GC):If you have a vanguard with "Herminia" in its card name, and your soul has no cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: During All Noctium Day, the school undergoes a transformation as well.

name: Meeting Delicacy, Hizumi
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your vanguard with "Michu" in its card name attacked this turn, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: This gentle sweetness, it's a flavor that penetrates all the way to the soul♪

name: Fancy Spell, Tietje
effect: [AUTO]Back Row (RC):When your other rear-guard in the same column as this unit [Stand] by your card's effect, if you have a vanguard with "Loronerol" in its card name, [Stand] this unit.
flavor: Costumes have the power to make girls a little more assertive.

name: Wonderful Wand, Rueboa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and you may return it to hand.[AUTO](RC):When your grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Siana" in its card name attacks or is attacked, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Strange sweets spin round and round, closing the gap between two people.

name: Affable Gaiter, Topya
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Haseritt" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to two cards from your hand, put them into soul, and draw cards equal to the number of cards put into soul.
flavor: Let's pack our dreams and snacks in our bags and set off!

name: Sturdy Sweets, Sameel
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck) [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
flavor: Please wait till I'm done eating this.

name: Night-illuminating Light, Caperatt
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Mediell" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose a card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from your drop, and call it to (RC).
flavor: It seems really interesting over there too! C'mon, let's go take a look!

name: Like a Utopia, Noortje
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Siana" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], return all of your opponent's front row rear-guards to hand, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: If you say the magic phrase, you can receive something special!

name: Prepared for the Heat, Siana
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit was attacked by a rear-guard, if no cards were put on (GC) this battle, your opponent chooses a card from their hand, and they may discard it. If they did not discard a card, bind the rear-guard that attacked.[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 3 card with "Siana" in its card name, choose a trigger unit or blitz order from your drop, and put it into hand.
flavor: Ice cream in this season is the best~!

name: Guileless Smile, Fenelle
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from a grade 1 card, look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to two "Trick & Treat!" from among them, reveal them and put them into hand, and shuffle the deck.
flavor: Realizing that an unadorned smile is one's greatest weapon.

name: Diva of Greeting Gloom, Roselita
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with "Labrador" in its card name, choose up to one unit card with "PR♥ISM" in its card name from your hand, and call it to (RC). If you called a card, draw a card.
flavor: I'll welcome you with the most... dazzling smile!

name: Seabed Sorcery, Patrice
effect: [ACT](RC):If your opponent's front row has no rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into soul], choose a blitz order from your drop, and put it into hand.
flavor: They say that there's a secret magic slumbering at the bottom of the sea.

name: To the East to the West, Mamarte
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard's attack hits a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and return this unit to hand.
flavor: I've been invited to so many places~ It's making me so busy~!

name: Candies of Appreciation, Casandra
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) or (GC), if you have a vanguard with "LèVre♡SœurS" in its card name, you may [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: Gotta give a treat to the lil' souls too.

name: Elated Attention, Carlin
effect: [CONT](RC):If your ride deck has a face up card with the same card name as your vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +10000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: I'll show you my best side~!

name: Soul-stirring Diva, Monette
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 3 card with "Pacifica" in its card name, choose one of your vanguards, and until end of turn, the cost of that unit's original [ACT] ability is reduced by [Counter-Blast 1].
flavor: The real festival is just beginning. Let's have even more fun♪

name: LèVre♡SœurS, Calmina
effect: [CONT](VC):If your soul has two or more grade 1 or less cards with "LèVre♡SœurS" in their different card names, when you would ride a grade 3 card with "LèVre♡SœurS" in its card name from the ride deck, you can ride without discarding a card from hand. [AUTO](RC):When this unit is chosen by the ability of your [Power] 23000 or greater vanguard with "LèVre♡SœurS" in its card name, [Counter-Charge 1]/[Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: To be loved and adoredーーit is a natural-born gift.

name: All Eyes on Me! Truus
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other unit attacks from the back row center column, you may return this unit to hand. [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC) from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Feel free to take more photos of me~

name: Celebrations Cicerone, Pelagia
effect: [CONT](GC):If you played a blitz order this turn, this unit gets [Shield] +10000.
flavor: Welcome! To our school's All Noctium Day!

name: Step Towards the Extraordinary, Radiarno
effect: [CONT]:You cannot ride this card.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if none of your rear-guards were returned to hand this turn, retire this unit.
flavor: I thought it might be boring if I was like everyone else.

name: Only One, Wilma
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if all of your units have different card names, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Costumes as each prefers, showcasing every individuality.

name: Bold Junior, Liene
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a grade 3 or greater unit, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: I won't hold back today, even with the seniors.

name: Gazing Expectations, Cursone
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of the units boosted by this unit, and it gets "[AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, [COST][discard a card from hand], choose up to one unit card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from your hand, and call it to an open (RC)." until end of turn.
flavor: There's still more to come, right?

name: Chilling Tonight, Nebirona
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your unit with "PR♥ISM" in its card name is placed on another (RC) in the same column as this unit, that placed unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Step away from the clamor for a little while, and let your heart quietly flutter.

name: Diva of Threnody, Mariette
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Diva of Greeting Gloom, Roselita", look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "PR♥ISM" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you did not reveal a card, you may call this card to (RC). If you called a card, [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: From the castle, one can hear a symphony of rare collaborations.

name: Diva of Lanterns, Anais
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to two cards with "Pacifica" in their card names from among them, reveal them and put them into hand, and shuffle the deck.
flavor: Lively and sparkling~♪ It's so incredibly happy☆

name: Second Snake's Opinion, Siana
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit was attacked by a rear-guard, if no cards were put on (GC) this battle, your opponent chooses a card from their hand, and they may discard it. If they did not discard a card, bind the rear-guard that attacked.[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 2 card with "Siana" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, and return all of your opponent's front row rear-guards to hand.
flavor: Hmm~ Which one do you guys think is the best?

name: Liven-up Light, Clautilde
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you have a vanguard with "LèVre♡SœurS" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], and [Soul-Charge 2].
flavor: The remarkable ambient lighting is said to be the results of her hard work.

name: LèVre♡SœurS, Haudia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 2 card with "LèVre♡SœurS" in its card name, you may call this card to (RC). If you called a card, [Soul-Charge 1], and put this unit into soul at the end of that turn.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked or boosted, if you have a [Power] 23000 or greater vanguard with "LèVre♡SœurS" in its card name, [COST][put two grade 2 or less rear-guards with "LèVre♡SœurS" in their different card names into soul], and draw a card.
flavor: Allow us to indulge you in our allure to the fullest extent.

name: Finding My Own Appeal, Fenelle
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from a grade 0, look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to two "Trick & Treat!" from among them, reveal them and put them into hand, and shuffle the deck.
flavor: What kind of outfit would suit me......?

name: All Warmed Up, Siana
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Alrighty! Let's go all out today too~!

name: Coaxing Diva, Milene
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Kuronya and I invite you into a world of dreams~♡

name: Hop & Step! Fenelle
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: And right here...! Jump!♪

name: Diva of Evening Moon, Hyacinthe
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: With heartfelt wishes, may you sing on the grandest stage.

name: LèVre♡SœurS, Cocris
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: I'm fine with just playing games and eating snacks. It's the best~

name: Shocking Candy, Ouris
flavor: When you put it in your mouth, it feels like little sparks. It's really fun!

name: The Winner, Elinor
flavor: Held in those hands are the legendary treats everyone envies.

name: Beautiful Demeanor, Schrentia
flavor: Those charming gestures ignite fervor in the students.

name: Love thy Cat, Lysanne
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: Cats are the ultimate source of comfort. That's a timeless, unchanging verity.

name: Bubble Soap Garden
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1] if you have six or more units!Draw two cards.
flavor: Bubbles of dreams that color the campus. Soar high, and burst into the skies!

name: Trick & Treat!
effect: [CONT]:You may have up to sixteen "Trick & Treat!" in a deck.Play this if you have a vanguard with "Fenelle" in its card name!Perform one of the following according to the number of times you played an order with the same card name as this card this turn.・1 time ‐ Your opponent chooses one of their rear-guards, and they may put it on the bottom of the deck. If they did not put a rear-guard, you draw a card. ・2 times ‐ Draw a card, and [Counter-Charge 1]. ・3 times - Choose up to one grade 3 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC).
flavor: I wonder, which one will you choose? You could even choose all of them!

name: Trick & Treat!
effect: [CONT]:You may have up to sixteen "Trick & Treat!" in a deck.Play this if you have a vanguard with "Fenelle" in its card name!Perform one of the following according to the number of times you played an order with the same card name as this card this turn.・1 time ‐ Your opponent chooses one of their rear-guards, and they may put it on the bottom of the deck. If they did not put a rear-guard, you draw a card. ・2 times ‐ Draw a card, and [Counter-Charge 1]. ・3 times - Choose up to one grade 3 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC).
flavor: Faces of surprise, and faces of delight. Preparation is envisioning the joyful moments to come.

name: Pretty♡Demoncoord!
effect: Choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets "[AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, return this unit to hand." until end of turn. At the end of that turn, [COST][discard a card from hand], choose a "Pretty♡Demoncoord!" from your drop, and put it into hand.
flavor: This year's trend is "devilishly adorable".

name: Unseeable Exterior
effect: Play this card if you have three or more open (RC)!Choose one of your attacked units, and it gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle. If your opponent's vanguard is placed by a card's ability this turn, it gets +30000 instead of +15000.
flavor: Make sure not to cut corners even on the parts that can't be seen.

name: Enduring Beauty, Herminia
effect: DressUp - "Coming Beauty, Herminia"[CONT](VC):During your battle phase, if your damage zone has three or more face down cards, the cost of all the [AUTO] abilities of all of your front row units with the Powerful ability is reduced by [Counter-Blast 1].Powerful - [AUTO](VC):If you persona rode this turn, this cost may be paid with "[Counter-Blast 1]". At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if your soul has no cards, [COST][discard a card with "Herminia" in its card name from hand], and [Stand] all of your front row rear-guards with the Powerful ability.

name: Gorgon Eyes, Siana
effect: [CONT](VC):If your opponent's (GC) and front row (RC) have a total of two or less units, this unit gets [Critical] +1/drive +1.[AUTO](VC):When this unit is attacked, [COST][put a trigger unit from hand into soul], and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit was attacked by a rear-guard, if no cards were put on (GC) this battle, your opponent chooses a card from their hand, and they may discard it. If they did not discard a card, bind the rear-guard that attacked.

name: Colored Bop Dragon, Walbrigia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), choose up to one grade 4 card from your hand, and reveal it. If you revealed a card, or your vanguard is grade 4, perform one of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) ‐ [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. ・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle. [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand while riding a grade 3 card from the ride deck or paying the cost for [Stride], draw a card.

name: Top Idol, Pacifica
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a card from hand on the bottom of the deck], and draw two cards. [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1 card with "Pacifica" in its card name], search your deck for up to one normal unit, call it to an open (RC), and shuffle the deck.

name: Tr!ple×Tr!ck, Fenelle
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, you can play three orders, but you cannot play orders other than "Trick & Treat!" or [Regalis Piece]. [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if you played three or more orders this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, until end of turn, that unit and this unit get [Critical] +1, and all of your front row units get [Power] +2000 for each "Trick & Treat!" in your drop.

name: Planet Idol, Pacifica
effect: [CONT]Back Row Center (RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Pacifica" in its card name, this unit can attack from the back row, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +10000. [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Pacifica" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you put a card from the back row center column into soul, draw a card.

name: PR♥ISM-Promise, Labrador
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, return it to hand, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to two unit cards with "PR♥ISM" in their card names from your hand, and call them to open (RC). name: Full Moon Magic, Fortia
effect: DressUp - "MiMish, Fortia"Friend - [CONT](VC/RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends", and if you have three or more other "Friends", this unit gets drive +1.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:If you persona rode this turn, this cost may be paid with "[Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand]". At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have five or more other "Friends", [COST][discard a card with "Fortia" in its card name from hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -2 until end of turn.

name: LèVre♡SœurS, Charmout
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to two grade 2 or less cards with "LèVre♡SœurS" in their card names from your soul, call them to (RC), and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks while not boosted, choose three of your grade 2 or less rear-guards with "LèVre♡SœurS" in their different card names, and increase or decrease their [Power] to match this unit's [Power] until end of turn. If this unit's [Power] is 33000 or greater, and your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], until end of turn, the rear-guard in the back row center column chosen by this ability can attack from the back row, and performs drive checks.

name: Jack o' Parade, Theretheas
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and you may return it to hand.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Siana" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's open front row (RC). If it gets [Power] +10000 or greater, draw a card.

name: Soaring Bubble, Penelopp
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Kairi" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other front row rear-guard is returned to hand by the ability of your grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Kairi" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] all of your rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and if your vanguard is grade 4 or greater, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: One Night Witch, Strega
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) other than by a unit card's ability, if you played a normal order this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from among them and reveal it, call it to (RC) if it is a unit card, and put it into hand if it is a normal order. name: Waiting Staging, Murmus
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if your soul has five or more Cursed Play cards, [COST][retire this unit], choose up to two Cursed Play cards from your soul, and put them into hand.

name: Whimsical↔Skip, Lopraht
effect: [CONT](GC):This unit gets [Shield] +5000 for every three "Trick & Treat!" in your drop.

name: Groupie Member, Carlotta
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Feltyrosa" in its card name, this unit gets "Intercept", can intercept from the back row, and gets [Power] +2000.

name: Grab the First Row, Bernarda
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack of the unit this unit boosted hits, look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Pacifica" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you revealed a card, put this unit on the bottom of the deck.

name: Dreaming of an Encounter, Hester
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire this unit], reveal the top three cards of your deck, choose up to two cards with "Earnescorrect" in their card names from among them, put them into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you chose two cards with the same card name, [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Nightlight Unison, Litael
effect: White Wings - [AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if two or more of your vanguards with "Alestiel" in their card names were placed this turn, and your damage zone has no face up cards, [COST][put this unit into soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Pumpkin Breeze, Lybitta
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if you have five or more units with the Powerful ability, you may return all of your rear-guards in the same column as this unit to hand. Powerful - [CONT](GC):If you have a vanguard with "Herminia" in its card name, and your soul has no cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.

name: Meeting Delicacy, Hizumi
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your vanguard with "Michu" in its card name attacked this turn, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Fancy Spell, Tietje
effect: [AUTO]Back Row (RC):When your other rear-guard in the same column as this unit [Stand] by your card's effect, if you have a vanguard with "Loronerol" in its card name, [Stand] this unit.

name: Wonderful Wand, Rueboa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and you may return it to hand.[AUTO](RC):When your grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Siana" in its card name attacks or is attacked, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Affable Gaiter, Topya
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Haseritt" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to two cards from your hand, put them into soul, and draw cards equal to the number of cards put into soul.

name: Sturdy Sweets, Sameel
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.

name: Night-illuminating Light, Caperatt
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Mediell" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose a card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from your drop, and call it to (RC).

name: Enduring Beauty, Herminia
effect: DressUp - "Coming Beauty, Herminia"[CONT](VC):During your battle phase, if your damage zone has three or more face down cards, the cost of all the [AUTO] abilities of all of your front row units with the Powerful ability is reduced by [Counter-Blast 1].Powerful - [AUTO](VC):If you persona rode this turn, this cost may be paid with "[Counter-Blast 1]". At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if your soul has no cards, [COST][discard a card with "Herminia" in its card name from hand], and [Stand] all of your front row rear-guards with the Powerful ability.

name: Gorgon Eyes, Siana
effect: [CONT](VC):If your opponent's (GC) and front row (RC) have a total of two or less units, this unit gets [Critical] +1/drive +1.[AUTO](VC):When this unit is attacked, [COST][put a trigger unit from hand into soul], and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit was attacked by a rear-guard, if no cards were put on (GC) this battle, your opponent chooses a card from their hand, and they may discard it. If they did not discard a card, bind the rear-guard that attacked.

name: Tr!ple×Tr!ck, Fenelle
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, you can play three orders, but you cannot play orders other than "Trick & Treat!" or [Regalis Piece]. [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if you played three or more orders this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, until end of turn, that unit and this unit get [Critical] +1, and all of your front row units get [Power] +2000 for each "Trick & Treat!" in your drop.

name: Full Moon Magic, Fortia
effect: DressUp - "MiMish, Fortia"Friend - [CONT](VC/RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends", and if you have three or more other "Friends", this unit gets drive +1.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:If you persona rode this turn, this cost may be paid with "[Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand]". At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have five or more other "Friends", [COST][discard a card with "Fortia" in its card name from hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -2 until end of turn.

name: LèVre♡SœurS, Charmout
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to two grade 2 or less cards with "LèVre♡SœurS" in their card names from your soul, call them to (RC), and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks while not boosted, choose three of your grade 2 or less rear-guards with "LèVre♡SœurS" in their different card names, and increase or decrease their [Power] to match this unit's [Power] until end of turn. If this unit's [Power] is 33000 or greater, and your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], until end of turn, the rear-guard in the back row center column chosen by this ability can attack from the back row, and performs drive checks.

name: One Night Witch, Strega
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) other than by a unit card's ability, if you played a normal order this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from among them and reveal it, call it to (RC) if it is a unit card, and put it into hand if it is a normal order. Shuffle the deck.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater unit, if this unit was placed this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Top Idol, Pacifica
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a card from hand on the bottom of the deck], and draw two cards. [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1 card with "Pacifica" in its card name], search your deck for up to one normal unit, call it to an open (RC), and shuffle the deck.

name: Planet Idol, Pacifica
effect: [CONT]Back Row Center (RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Pacifica" in its card name, this unit can attack from the back row, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +10000. [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Pacifica" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you put a card from the back row center column into soul, draw a card.

name: PR♥ISM-Promise, Labrador
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, return it to hand, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to two unit cards with "PR♥ISM" in their card names from your hand, and call them to open (RC). If you called a card, draw a card, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, until end of turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000, and this unit gets [Critical] +1.

name: PR♥ISM-Promise, Celtic
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand or put on (GC) from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Labrador" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Labrador" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], return this unit to hand, choose up to one of your rear-guards with "PR♥ISM" in its card name, and return it to hand.

name: PR♥ISM-Promise, Leyte
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand or put on (GC) from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Labrador" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000 until end of turn. [AUTO]:When this unit is returned to hand from (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Labrador" in its card name, you may [Soul-Charge 1]. Then, if you did not [Counter-Charge] this turn, [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Dreamy Cafe, Reptlass
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
